graph LR
X
subgraph one
    A --> B
end
---
+---+     +-----------------+
|   |     |       one       |
| X |     |                 |
|   |     |                 |
+---+     | +---+     +---+ |
          | |   |     |   | |
          | | A |---->| B | |
          | |   |     |   | |
          | +---+     +---+ |
          |                 |
          +-----------------+
